titleStmt.title: Summary reasons against the new oath & Engagement. And an admonition to all such as have already subscribed it. With a cautionarie exhortation to all honest English spirits, to avoid the danger of perjurie by taking of it.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
